The incumbent must adhere to the Amrize WCAN Quality Management Strategy, the Regional Amrize Health and Safety Policy, as well as local business and lab specific Safe Work Practices. The incumbent will report all near misses and injuries. Key Responsibilities: • Working with the lab team in the quality control of ready-mix concrete through continual testing of raw materials, fresh concrete, and finished product • Preparation, batching, mixing, and testing of concrete mix designs and cementitious materials (strength, slump, durability, particle size etc.); supporting QA manager through KPIs to hit mix-related performance, consistency, cost savings, and environmental targets • Transportation and curing of test cylinders according to CSA specifications • If required, verification of fresh concrete properties at plant locations in conjunction with field QC team; communication and coordination with Production and Operations staff • Promoting a positive safety culture; performing all work activities according to the relevant safety policies and procedures, • contributing to monthly safety meetings to improve safety in the workplace Completion of Field-Level Risk Assessments and environmental checklists, reporting of all safety and environmental incidents • Results/Accountabilities: The successful applicant will be a self-sufficient, responsible, and focused individual who is to become well-versed in all quality testing of concrete raw materials and fresh and hardened concrete properties as per CSA requirements. They will gain hands-on experience in lab functions and concrete mix design, as well as exposure to processing and testing as they relate to an industrial/construction environment. This position offers plenty of autonomy and potential for a demonstrated self-starter, but requires a high level of accuracy and attention to detail, and a humble, hard-working attitude. The position will be based out of the Richmond Lab, with the possibility of other locations in Vancouver. From the use of alternate materials and recycling to renewable energy, Amrize's focus is to develop innovative product that can contribute toward sustainably constructed building solutions.
